page.title: 11FARMING N.BEDS /S.W.CAMBS
page.content: {Chief Problems 1) Lack of small farms at prices enabling purchase by young farmers. 2) Lack of farmhouses on land that is available. 3) Changing agricultural policies of EEC, leading to over production of wheat and oilseed rape ,thus falling prices. 4) Lack of local facilities such as shops,post office,and adequate bus services to Bedford/Kimbolton/ Huntingdon though local state and private schools run special buses for transporting pupils. {Social Attitudes}basically conservative in outlook.Returned Conservative M.P. Opposed to Peace Campers at R.A.F.Molesworth. {Conservation}Support re-planting of trees in place of those killed by Dutch elm disease.
